name: VenomMyotismon
effect: ＜Retaliation＞ (When this Digimon is deleted after losing a battle, delete the Digimon it was battling.)[When Attacking][Once Per Turn] You may play 1 purple level 4 or lower Digimon card with ＜Retaliation＞ from your trash without paying its memory cost. Any [On Play] effects on Digimon played with this effect don't activate.
